snippet.title: Dungeon Quest: Full Trailer
snippet.description:
Dungeon Quest Version 1.4.3 NOW WITH PETS!

3 New Pets have been added each with their own unique abilities!
Defeat the new Enslaver Enemy to release pets from captivity while playing, or buy them (with gold!) from the merchant screen.

Adventure Dogs - These will pick up gold for you and find hidden treasure. 
Imps - These crafty imps pick up items you leave behind, and create new, more powerful items for you.
Fairy - The perfect battle pet! They heal you when your HP is low.

New Shop Changes:
- More vanity items are available for gold purchase
- You get more gold when you purchase gold packs
- Decreased the gold cost of many items in the game

Bug Fixes: 
- Addressed issue with stash cost, this has been lowered greatly.
- Fixed an issue with the Lance weapon: primary and secondary skills now work correctly
- Fixed several lighting issue in the game
- Fixed several controller related bugs

Thank you to all of our players and community members for your support while we created this update.

If you need help or have questions: 
Check out our full patch notes: http://shinyboxgames.com/blog/?p=349
Visit our community forums: shinyboxgames.com
Use our support email - support@shinyboxgames.com
